My ZenTime Pro watch won't turn on even after charging for over 6 hours. I've tried multiple chargers and outlets.
I was charged twice for my ZenTime Pro purchase on my credit card. The transactions are showing as pending and posted.
The delivery package for my ZenTime Lite arrived completely empty. The sealed box contained no watch or accessories.
The battery on my ZenTime Plus drains within 2 hours of a full charge, even with minimal usage and all extra features disabled.
The heart rate sensor on my ZenTime Pro is consistently showing inaccurate readings, often significantly higher or lower than my actual heart rate.
I need a full refund for my order. I received the wrong color ZenTime Lite (blue instead of black) and the packaging was damaged.
Cannot connect my ZenTime watch to my Android phone. The app keeps saying 'connection failed' despite multiple attempts and reboots.
I haven't received my order confirmation email for my ZenTime Plus purchase. I placed the order two days ago and the payment has been processed.
My ZenTime Lite watch battery won't charge past 50%. The charging indicator light remains solid, but the percentage won't increase.
The screen on my ZenTime Lite is flickering intermittently, especially when displaying darker colors. It's distracting and makes the watch unusable.
I was overcharged on my credit card statement for my ZenTime Pro order. The total amount charged is higher than the advertised price.
The GPS on my ZenTime watch is not working correctly. It takes a very long time to acquire a signal, and the location tracking is inaccurate.
My ZenTime watch band broke after only a week of use. The pin holding the band together snapped while I was wearing it.
I received the wrong model of ZenTime watch. I ordered the ZenTime Pro, but I received the ZenTime Lite instead.
The watch battery died completely and won't revive. I've tried charging it with different cables and adapters, but it remains unresponsive.
The fitness tracking features on my ZenTime Plus are not syncing with my app. My steps and activity data are not appearing in the app's history.
I have a question about my invoice for my ZenTime order. I need clarification on some of the charges listed.
The screen on my ZenTime Plus is cracked. It appears to have cracked spontaneously, as I haven't dropped or bumped the watch.
My order status shows 'delivered' but I haven't received it. I've checked with my neighbors and the building's reception, but no one has seen the package.
The battery life on my ZenTime Pro has significantly decreased over the past month. It now lasts only a few hours on a single charge.
The watch keeps restarting randomly throughout the day. It interrupts my activity tracking and makes the watch unreliable.
I need to change my billing address associated with my ZenTime account. I've moved recently and need to update my information.
The pedometer feature on my ZenTime Lite is not accurate. It consistently undercounts my steps compared to other fitness trackers.
My delivery was delayed beyond the estimated arrival date. The tracking information hasn't been updated in several days.
The ZenTime watch battery heats up significantly while charging. It becomes uncomfortably warm to the touch.
The touch screen on my ZenTime Plus is unresponsive. It doesn't register my taps or swipes, making the watch unusable.
I have a payment dispute regarding a charge on my credit card for a ZenTime subscription I did not authorize.
The watch face on my ZenTime Pro is scratched upon arrival. The scratch is visible and detracts from the watch's appearance.
I received an empty box instead of the ZenTime watch. The box was sealed, but it contained no watch or accessories.
The battery percentage on my ZenTime Lite drops rapidly, even when the watch is idle. It goes from 100% to 50% in a matter of minutes.
The Bluetooth connection between my ZenTime watch and my phone keeps dropping. I have to constantly reconnect them.
I was charged for a subscription I didn't sign up for. I've never authorized a ZenTime subscription.
The watch strap on my ZenTime Plus is damaged. The stitching is coming undone, and the strap is fraying.
The delivery tracking information for my ZenTime order is incorrect. It shows the package being delivered to a different city.
The battery on my ZenTime Pro drains even when the watch is in standby mode. It loses power overnight without being used.
The ZenTime watch is freezing and unresponsive. I have to force a restart to get it working again.
I need to update my payment method for my ZenTime subscription. My current card is expiring soon.
The watch display on my ZenTime Lite has dead pixels. There are several dark spots on the screen that don't display any information.
My package was marked as delivered but I didn't receive it. I've contacted the delivery company, but they haven't been able to locate it.
The battery on my ZenTime Plus takes too long to charge. It takes several hours to reach a full charge.
The ZenTime watch is not vibrating for notifications. I've checked the settings, and the vibration is enabled, but it's not working.
I need to cancel my order and request a refund. I've changed my mind about the purchase.
The ZenTime watch is water damaged despite being advertised as waterproof. I wore it while swimming, and now it's malfunctioning.
I received a damaged package for my ZenTime order. The outer box was crushed, and the watch's packaging was also damaged.
The battery health on my ZenTime Lite is showing as critical after a short time. It's significantly degraded after only a few months of use.
The ZenTime watch is not syncing data to the cloud. My activity data is not being backed up, and I'm losing all my fitness progress information.
I have a question about my promotional discount for my ZenTime purchase. The discount code I entered at checkout was not applied, and I was charged the full price.
The ZenTime watch's speaker is not working. I cannot hear any notifications or audio from the watch, even at maximum volume.
My order was shipped to the wrong address. I provided the correct address during checkout, but the tracking information shows it being delivered to a different location.
The battery on my ZenTime Plus is swelling. The back of the watch is bulging, and I'm concerned about a potential fire hazard.
